values.name: Star Spit
values.description: Spit your opponent as a star.
values.moveMessage: {sender} inhales {target} and spits them out as a star, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly inhales {target} and spits them out as a star, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} tries to inhale {target} but {target} blocks it!
values.blockFailMessage: {target} tries to block but {sender} inhales them and spits {target} out as a star, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} tries to inhale {target} but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {target} tries to evade but {sender} inhales them and spits {target} out as a star, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} inhales {target} and spits them out as a star, dealing {-hpValue} critical damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} quickly inhales {target} and spits them out as a star, dealing {-hpValue} critical damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {target} tries to block but {sender} inhales them and spits {target} out as a star, dealing {-hpValue} critical damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {target} tries to evade but {sender} inhales them and spits {target} out as a star, dealing {-hpValue} critical damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to inhale {target} but {target} was not sucked in.

values.name: Dash
values.description: Dash towards your opponent in a spiraling blaze.
values.moveMessage: {sender} dashes towards {target} in a firey blaze, dealing {-hpValue} damage and draining {-stValue} {st.ext_full}!
values.fastMessage: {sender} rapidly dashes towards {target} in a firey blaze, dealing {-hpValue} damage and draining {-stValue} {st.ext_full}!
values.blockMessage: {sender} dashes towards {target} in a firey blaze but {target} blocks, dealing only {-hpValue} damage and {-stValue} {st.ext_full} drain!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} dashes towards {target} in a firey blaze and {target} fails to block, dealing {-hpValue} damage and {-stValue} {st.ext_full} drain!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} dashes towards {target} in a blaze but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} dashes towards {target} in a blaze and {target} fails to evade, dealing {-hpValue} damage and {-stValue} {st.ext_full} drain!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} dashes towards {target} in a scorching-hot blaze, critically dealing {-hpValue} damage and draining {-stValue} {st.ext_full}!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} quickly dashes towards {target} in a scorching-hot blaze, critically dealing {-hpValue} damage and draining {-stValue} {st.ext_full}!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} dashes towards {target} in a scorching-hot blaze and {target} fails to block, critically dealing {-hpValue} damage and {-stValue} {st.ext_full} drain!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} dashes towards {target} in a scorching-hot blaze and {target} fails to evade, critically dealing {-hpValue} damage and {-stValue} {st.ext_full} drain!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to dash towards {target} but explodes into a ball of fire, losing {-hpValue} {hp.ext_full}, {-stCost} {st.ext_full}, and {-mpCost} {mp.ext_full}!

values.name: Hammer
values.description: Charge up your hammer and smash down.
values.moveMessage: {sender} charges up their hammer and slams it down on {target}, dealing {-hpValue} damage!

values.name: Hitstun
values.description: Stun from being hit by a hammer.

values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly charges up their hammer and slams it down on {target}, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} charges up their hammer and {target} blocks, slamming down for {-hpValue} damage and {-stValue} {st.ext_full} drain!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} charges up their hammer and {target} fails to block, slamming down for {-hpValue} damage and {-stValue} {st.ext_full} drain!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} charges up their hammer but {target} evades, making {sender} miss!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} charges up their hammer and {target} fails to evade, slamming down for {-hpValue} damage and {-stValue} {st.ext_full} drain!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} charges up their hammer and SMASHES {target} with it, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} charges up their hammer and SMASHES {target} with it, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} charges up their hammer and SMASHES through {target}'s block, dealing {-hpValue} damage and {-stValue} {st.ext_full} drain!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} charges up their hammer and {target} was too slow to evade, SMASHING {target} for {-hpValue} damage and {-stValue} {st.ext_full} drain!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to charge their hammer but fails, losing {-(int(move.fmt('stC')) + int(move.fmt('stF')))} {st.ext_full}!

values.name: Inhale
values.fastMessage: {sender} takes a deep breath, regaining {hpCost} {hp.ext_full} and {stCost} {st.ext_full}.
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to take a deep breath but only gains {hpCost} {hp.ext_full} and {int(stCost) + int(stValue)} {st.ext_full}.

values.name: Throw
values.blockMessage: {sender} tries to throw {target} but {target} breaks free from {sender}'s grip!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} tries to throw {target} and {target} fails to break free, getting thrown for {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} tries to throw {target} but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} tries to throw {target} and {target} fails to evade it, getting thrown for {-hpValue} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} strongly and quickly throws {target} forwards for {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {target} fails to break free from {sender}'s grab and gets strongly thrown forwards for {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {target} fails to evade {sender}'s grab and gets strongly thrown forwards for {-hpValue} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to throw {target} but couldn't lift {target} up.
